comments.comments_text: The game has begun to heat up. David Hovorka (Slavia Prague) challenges an opponent and receives a deserved yellow card for his ugly tackle.

comments.comments_text: Erik Sviatchenko (Midtjylland) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Damir Skomina had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Pione Sisto (Midtjylland) saw red with that tackle. Damir Skomina won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: Brian Priske has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Anders Dreyer (Midtjylland) replacing Pione Sisto.

comments.comments_text: Goal! A nice lofted pass into the box by Awer Mabil is pounced on by Sory Kaba (Midtjylland). His close-range header flashes past Ondrej Kolar and into the middle of the goal. 1:1.
